verbs.description: [ARG0: AT&T Inc.] [V: paid] [ARG2: President Donald Trump ’s personal lawyer , Michael Cohen ,] [ARG1: up to $ 600,000] [ARG3: for insights] and asked him to look into its proposed $ 85 billion merger with Time Warner Inc. as it sought government antitrust approval , according to a person familiar with the matter .
